testcase.system-out: Given Doctor is available...................................................passed And user can click on profile...............................................passed Then user is redirected to doctor profile...................................passed

testcase.name: User redirection to Appointment page
testcase.system-out: Given user has selected a Doctor............................................passed And book appointment button is clicked......................................passed And user is logged-in.......................................................passed Then user can view appointment form.........................................passed

testcase.name: Display of invalid dates
